Name: sprint_effort_must_not_exceed_velocity
Description: The sum of story points for all user stories in a sprint must be less than or equal to the team's velocity.

Name: team_size_must_be_within_scrum_limits
Description: The size of a development team must be between 3 and 9 members.

Name: worker_must_not_exceed_availability
Description: A worker's total assigned task effort cannot exceed their availability for the sprint.

Name: sprint_must_have_one_goal
Description: Each sprint must be associated with exactly one sprint goal.

Name: user_story_must_have_criteria
Description: A user story can only be added to a sprint if its acceptance criteria are defined.

Name: team_must_have_scrum_master
Description: Every team must have a designated Scrum Master.

Name: task_cannot_be_done_if_blocked
Description: A task's status cannot be 'done' if it has an active, unresolved blocker linked to it.

Name: prefer_certified_skills
Description: When assigning workers, it is preferable to use a worker who has a certification for the required skill.

Name: avoid_low_priority_epics
Description: Epics with the lowest priority level should not be scheduled in the current release plan.

Name: project_must_adhere_to_end_date
Description: All sprints and releases for a project must be completed before the project's official end date.

Name: product_owner_manages_one_backlog
Description: A Product Owner should be responsible for one and only one Product Backlog.

Name: daily_scrum_must_be_short
Description: The duration of a Daily Scrum meeting should not exceed 15 minutes.
